interface.name: zwp_text_input_manager_v3
interface.description: A global interface used for text input.

request.name: get_text_input
request.description: Create a zwp_text_input_v3 object for a seat.

interface.name: zwp_text_input_v3
interface.description: The zwp_text_input_v3 interface represents text input and input methods associated with a seat.

request.name: enable

description.summary: enable text input for a surface

request.description: Enable text input for the currently focused surface.

request.name: disable

description.summary: disable text input for a surface

request.description: Disable text input for the currently focused surface.

request.name: set_surrounding_text
request.description: Sets the surrounding plain text around cursor position.

request.name: set_text_change_cause
request.description: Tells the compositor why the surrounding text or cursor changed.

request.name: set_content_type
request.description: Set input content hint and purpose.

request.name: set_cursor_rectangle
request.description: Set cursor rectangle in surface local coordinates.

request.name: commit
request.description: Applies state from enable/disable and setters.

event.name: enter
event.description: Text input focus entered the provided surface.

event.name: leave
event.description: Text input focus left the provided surface.

event.name: delete_surrounding_text
event.description: Request deleting surrounding text around current cursor.

event.name: done
event.description: Signals the end of an input method state update.
